data.name: boostorg/bind
data.readme:
# Boost.Bind

Branch   | Travis | Appveyor
---------|--------|---------
Develop  | [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/boostorg/bind.svg?branch=develop)](https://travis-ci.org/boostorg/bind) | [![Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/boostorg/bind?branch=develop&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/pdimov/bind)
Master   | [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/boostorg/bind.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/boostorg/bind) | [![Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/boostorg/bind?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/pdimov/bind)

versions.manifest:
targets = [ "//:bind" ]

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-config"
version = "branch=master"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-detail"
version = "branch=master"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-core"
version = "branch=master"
versions.lockFile:
manifest = "9366a51d832ec29a3e505b6115d3f65b14670da3f10b7f88ed321f6d69d3cd0e"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-config"
target = "//:config"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-core"
target = "//:core"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-detail"
target = "//:detail"

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-assert"]
versions = [ "branch=master" ]
revision = "f9d6a7b63ef2902777b6078fdebc54e7a57aac03"

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-config"]
versions = [ "branch=master" ]
revision = "4392ed19b232ed2dde7623843d7e30ef669d860e"

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-core"]
versions = [ "branch=master" ]

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-detail"]

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/boost-type_traits"]

versions.buck:
load('//:buckaroo_macros.bzl', 'buckaroo_deps')

prebuilt_cxx_library(
  name = 'bind',
  header_only = True,
  header_namespace = 'boost',
  exported_headers = subdir_glob([
    ('include/boost', '**/*.hpp'),
  ]),
  deps = buckaroo_deps(), 
  visibility = [
    'PUBLIC',
  ],
)

cxx_binary(
  name = 'bind-as-compose', 
  srcs = [
    'bind_as_compose.cpp', 
  ], 
  deps = [
    ':bind', 
  ], 
)

cxx_binary(
  name = 'bind-visitor', 
  srcs = [
    'bind_visitor.cpp', 
  ], 
  deps = [
    ':bind', 
  ], 
)
